Name: Ending Way
About the game: You wake up looking for mom and dad. You walk around the house and notice that they are not there. You start to see a lot of abnormal things. You go down to the basement and find a room with dead bodies. Demons are trying to attack you. 1. Ending way is a horror game and can be scary for some. If you have difficulty with it, you can take them carefully and always be prepared. The game is a horror action game. You need to find the way out and escape. Find items to use and dont die. 2. Find things that can make it easier for you 3. realistic environment and realistic creatures
